channel.title: fsx on tecRacer Chef
channel.description: Recent content in fsx on tecRacer Chef

item.title: FSx for NetApp ONTAP Manageability Options
item.description:
While Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP (FSxN) seems relatively easy on the AWS level, it is vastly more powerful if you pick another way to manage it.

This post will look at a quick run-down across the AWS Web Console, NetApp’s BlueXP, various APIs, and the CLI.

item.title: Logging Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP
item.description:
Recently, I spent a lot of time using the exciting new member of the FSx family. One detail made working with it a bit unpleasant, though - the lack of log files.

This post details how to create a custom integration into CloudWatch Logs and make ONTAP audit logs visible.
